attributes.action: Make stronger penalties for public drunkeness and don't penalize responsible drinkers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Police should breath test troublesome drunks and fine them according to amount consumed over a certain limit outlawing public drunkeness. Discression could be used towards those who are lightly drunk and not being a public nuisance.
Responsible drinkers already pay a high enough price compared to European neighbours.
